title: As Underground Fire Smolders Near Radioactive Waste, EPA Dismisses Concerns
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Green - Today 
A St. Louis-area community is on edge as a 5-year-old fire burning underneath a landfill threatens to interact with nearby nuclear waste, wi...
